QuestData.Title: Grease The Wheels
QuestData.Description:
Kerchunk said you guys was working on getting that mechaspider running again. Well I'm not gonna let you have all the fun!
That rusty old thing's gonna need a lot of grease to get moving again. So I jury-rigged a special Grease Trap to help you gather grease from the slimes nearby.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Grease Trap to collect $1oa Cog Grease from slimes around The Outflow.
